resources.string:
1. Go to your Instagram app. 
2. Navigate to the media you want to download. 
3. From the media's context menu (the 3 dots), select Copy Share URL. 
4. Return to this page and tap the Paste button. 
5. Tap the Download button to download the chosen media. 

Note: The Share URL can only be gotten from public profiles. For private profiles, use the Search function in the Search tab.
